mood.title: Mood Tracker
mood.subtitle: How are you feeling today? Track your emotional well-being.
mood.selectMoodDescription: Select the mood that best represents how you're feeling right now.
mood.description: Track your mood with a quick entry or detailed form
mood.notesPlaceholder: How are you feeling? What's on your mind?
mood.tip1Description: Take a few minutes each day to focus on the present moment.
mood.tip2Description: Regular exercise can significantly improve your mood and energy.
mood.tip3Description: Maintain social connections for better mental health.

replyToast.title: Thanks for checking in
replyToast.message: We'll tailor insights for your {{mood}} mood.

journal.title: Journal
journal.subtitle: Express your thoughts and feelings with emojis. AI will help you gain insights.
journal.entryTitlePlaceholder: Give your entry a short, descriptive title
journal.titleRequired: Please add a title to your journal entry.
journal.placeholder: Write about your day, your feelings, or anything on your mind...
journal.startWriting: Start by writing your first journal entry
journal.aiInfo: AI will automatically analyze your entry and provide insights about your mood and thoughts.

contrast.noticePositive: Your entry feels positive, but mood is set to {{mood}}.
contrast.noticeNegative: Your entry feels negative, but mood is set to {{mood}}.
contrast.updateRequired: Please update your mood first or choose Keep mood.

checkin.title: Check-in
checkin.subtitle: How are you feeling today? Share your mood and thoughts.

insights.title: Insights
insights.subtitle: Understand your mood patterns and track your progress.
insights.summaryProcessing: AI summaries are being generated for your entries. Check back soon!
insights.startTracking: Start tracking your mood from the Check-in page to see insights and trends.
insights.aiGeneratedSummaries: AI-generated summaries of your chat sessions
insights.noSummaries: No session summaries yet. Start chatting to see insights!
insights.noDataDescription: Start tracking your mood and chatting to see personalized insights.

chatbot.name: MindEase Assistant
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm here to support your mental wellness journey. How can I help you today?
chatbot.moodResponse: I understand you're sharing about your mood. It's great that you're being mindful of how you feel. Would you like to explore what might be influencing your mood today?
chatbot.journalResponse: Journaling is a wonderful way to process your thoughts and feelings. Have you considered writing about what's on your mind right now?
chatbot.helpResponse: I'm here to support you. Whether you need someone to listen, want to explore your feelings, or need coping strategies, I'm here to help. What would be most helpful for you right now?
chatbot.stressResponse: I hear that you're dealing with stress or anxiety. These feelings are completely normal. Some techniques that might help include deep breathing, mindfulness, or talking through what's causing these feelings. Would you like to try one of these approaches?
chatbot.sleepResponse: Sleep is so important for our mental health. If you're having trouble sleeping, it might help to establish a bedtime routine, limit screen time before bed, or practice relaxation techniques. What's been affecting your sleep lately?
chatbot.defaultResponse: Thank you for sharing that with me. I'm here to listen and support you. Can you tell me more about what's on your mind?

chat.voiceNotSupported: Voice chat not supported in this browser
chat.transcriptionError: Failed to transcribe. Please try again.
chat.testVoiceSample: This is a test of the text-to-speech voice.
chat.enableVoiceInSettings: Please enable both voice input and output in Settings to use voice conversation mode

voiceTutorial.title: Voice Conversation Mode
voiceTutorial.description: Have a natural conversation with the AI assistant using your voice. Your messages will be automatically transcribed and sent, and you'll hear the responses spoken aloud.

step1.title: Start Voice Mode
step1.description: Click the microphone button to start voice conversation mode. Make sure you've enabled both voice input and output in Settings.

step2.title: Speak Naturally
step2.description: Just speak naturally - your words will be transcribed automatically. You can use voice commands like 'stop', 'pause', or 'repeat' to control the conversation.

step3.title: Listen to Responses
step3.description: The AI's responses will be spoken aloud automatically. You can adjust the speech rate and volume in Settings.

step4.title: Stop When Done
step4.description: Click the microphone button again or say 'stop' to end voice conversation mode.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.description: Voice conversation mode works best in a quiet environment. Make sure your microphone is working and you have a stable internet connection.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.anonymousModeDescription: When enabled, your data will be automatically deleted after 7 days for enhanced privacy.
privacy.dataRetentionDescription: Your data is kept secure and can be deleted at any time.

convert.title: Convert to Full Account
